amendment.description: Amendment requires the State Department to submit an annual report to Congress listing overseas United States surplus properties for sale and specifies that amounts received from the sale of such property be used for deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the State Department to report to Congress by March 1 of each year a listing of overseas U.S. surplus properties for sale and require the amounts received from such sales to be used for deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 277 - 146 (Roll no. 161).

action.text: Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Bachus amendment (A006).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 146 (Roll no. 185).
